mapper.select: select messageType.*, userInfo.userName, userInfo.wxNickname, userInfo.userId as userCode, pmsServer.serverName, customer.customerName from `PMS_MessageType` messageType left join `PMS_Server` pmsServer on messageType.serverId = pmsServer.id left join `PMS_Customer` customer on pmsServer.customerId = customer.id left join `PMS_UserInfo` userInfo on messageType.userId = userInfo.id
mapper.insert: insert into `PMS_MessageType` (messageName, scheduleTime, serverId, userId, description, status, messageTime) values (#{messageName}, #{scheduleTime}, #{serverId}, #{userId}, #{description}, #{status}, #{messageTime})
